person.persName: John Rains (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mahala Starns Rains in Grant County, Kentucky on December 2, 1857. Father of Marion Rains, George Rains, and Grant Rains. Laborer for Thomas A. Huldwood in Grant County in 1850. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Employed Monroe Stearne as a farm laborer in Grant County in 1860. Mustered in as private in the 39th Regiment Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) on January 15, 1863. Reported as deserted from Louisa, Kentucky on February 28, 1863.
